name: Dispelling Fist

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11, ability to cast dispel magic, caster level 7th.

sections.body: If you have dispel magic prepared or can cast it spontaneously, you can cast it as a swift action after hitting an opponent with an unarmed strike. Treat this as a targeted dispel against the opponent you hit.
sections.name: Benefits

description: By focusing on your knowledge of magic and spells that negate its powers, you use your bare hands to rip magical defenses from your enemy.
